column3: @s-matthew-english Did you know you can use `$ git grep keypoololdest` to see if there are other affected rpcs, so all of them can be fixed in one go?\n

ahh, yeah I mean, I knew of 'grep' but I didn't use it before really. at the moment I'm tied up, but definetly later tonight I can and will do that, but- if you don't mind, could I try to do it myself so I can get some experience with that? \n

alright, great!

I've grepped for 'GMT epoch' and I spotted another one in "src/wallet/rpcwallet.cpp", so now I've changed that one too.

I commited everything according to that discussion we had last time so- I think I did it right. Is it so?
utACK 7f61b49de82989dc692e7750860eb1ec4044db7a, I think both describe the same thing, but it can't hurt...\n
They do mean the same thing, but I think that Unix epoch is less ambiguous.\n
